Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People took to social media to discuss their expectations for the upcoming Australian budget. While some are optimistic and believe that interesting policies would be introduced to help people others expressed concerns about the alleged delay in welfare payments amidst the cost-of-living crisis. A Twitter conversation also discussed the allocation of funds to weapon supplies to Ukraine while some MPs raised concerns about the risk of failure in Big Build initiatives. Overall people are hoping for measures in the budget to address the pressing needs of Australians while maintaining a sustainable financial plan.
